description: Filler content when no callers are available

lines.text: While we're waiting for the next caller, let me tell you about something interesting I read recently...
lines.voiceText: While we're waiting for the next caller, let me tell you about something interesting I read recently...

lines.text: You know, I've been thinking about the nature of reality lately. What is real, and what isn't?
lines.voiceText: You know, I've been thinking about the nature of reality lately. What is real, and what isn't?

lines.text: Keep those calls coming in, folks. The lines should be lighting up any moment now.
lines.voiceText: Keep those calls coming in, folks. The lines should be lighting up any moment now.

lines.text: In the meantime, let's talk about government cover-ups. You know they exist.
lines.voiceText: In the meantime, let's talk about government cover-ups. You know they exist.

lines.text: The phone lines are quiet right now, but that doesn't mean the truth is silent.
lines.voiceText: The phone lines are quiet right now, but that doesn't mean the truth is silent.

lines.text: While we wait, let me share a little known fact about Area 51...
lines.voiceText: While we wait, let me share a little known fact about Area 51...

lines.text: The night is young, and so are the mysteries we're about to uncover.
lines.voiceText: The night is young, and so are the mysteries we're about to uncover.

lines.text: Stay on the line, folks. Your call could be the one that breaks the story.
lines.voiceText: Stay on the line, folks. Your call could be the one that breaks the story.

lines.text: I've seen things that would make your hair stand on end. And we're just getting started.
lines.voiceText: I've seen things that would make your hair stand on end. And we're just getting started.

lines.text: The truth is out there, and tonight we're going to find some of it.
lines.voiceText: The truth is out there, and tonight we're going to find some of it.

lines.text: WOW! This is incredible! While we wait, let me tell you about this amazing sighting!
lines.voiceText: WOW! This is incredible! While we wait, let me tell you about this amazing sighting!

lines.text: Heh, this is hilarious. Let me share this funny story while we wait...
lines.voiceText: Heh, this is hilarious. Let me share this funny story while we wait...

lines.text: Interesting development. Let me analyze this situation while we wait for calls.
lines.voiceText: Interesting development. Let me analyze this situation while we wait for calls.

lines.text: Tch. While we wait for someone competent to call, let me rant about this.
lines.voiceText: Tch. While we wait for someone competent to call, let me rant about this.

lines.text: Ugh, this is ridiculous. Why isn't anyone calling? Let me complain about it.
lines.voiceText: Ugh, this is ridiculous. Why isn't anyone calling? Let me complain about it.

lines.text: *yawn* Okay, while we wait... let me just rest my eyes for a second.
lines.voiceText: *yawn* Okay, while we wait... let me just rest my eyes for a second.

lines.text: *yawn* While we wait... keep those lines open.
lines.voiceText: *yawn* While we wait... keep those lines open.

lines.text: Just hanging here... anyone out there?
lines.voiceText: Just hanging here... anyone out there?

lines.text: *grunt* Keep calling, folks.
lines.voiceText: *grunt* Keep calling, folks.

lines.text: While we wait for the next caller...
lines.voiceText: While we wait for the next caller...

lines.text: While we wait... if anyone calls.
lines.voiceText: While we wait... if anyone calls.

lines.text: Keep those lines open, I suppose.
lines.voiceText: Keep those lines open, I suppose.

lines.text: Anyone out there?
lines.voiceText: Anyone out there?

lines.text: Waiting for the next caller.
lines.voiceText: Waiting for the next caller.

lines.text: While we wait – hurry up and call already!
lines.voiceText: While we wait – hurry up and call already!

lines.text: Keep those lines open, damn it!
lines.voiceText: Keep those lines open, damn it!

lines.text: Anyone? Speak up!
lines.voiceText: Anyone? Speak up!

lines.text: While we wait for someone with guts to call!
lines.voiceText: While we wait for someone with guts to call!

lines.text: *sigh* While we wait...
lines.voiceText: *sigh* While we wait...

lines.text: Keep calling, please.
lines.voiceText: Keep calling, please.

lines.text: Anyone there?
lines.voiceText: Anyone there?

lines.text: Waiting impatiently.
lines.voiceText: Waiting impatiently.

lines.text: While we wait – think about the connections!
lines.voiceText: While we wait – think about the connections!

lines.text: Keep those lines open – the truth connects us!
lines.voiceText: Keep those lines open – the truth connects us!

lines.text: Anyone linking the dots out there?
lines.voiceText: Anyone linking the dots out there?

lines.text: While we wait for the next revelation!
lines.voiceText: While we wait for the next revelation!

lines.text: WHILE WE WAIT – THE ENERGY IS BUILDING! CALL NOW!
lines.voiceText: WHILE WE WAIT – THE ENERGY IS BUILDING! CALL NOW!

lines.text: KEEP THOSE LINES OPEN – THE TRUTH WON'T WAIT!
lines.voiceText: KEEP THOSE LINES OPEN – THE TRUTH WON'T WAIT!

lines.text: ANYONE OUT THERE? SPEAK UP – I'M BURSTING WITH ANTICIPATION!
lines.voiceText: ANYONE OUT THERE? SPEAK UP – I'M BURSTING WITH ANTICIPATION!
